website_summaries.verdict: An easy crowd pleaser, as it's affordable, easy to install, and works as expected.
pros: Surprisingly polished looking for the price point
Reviews suggest the install is very simple
A fan favorite that is arguably more than what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a paid review but... I would like it to be ;)🤯
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has a cartridge. Pretty good deal. Just make sure not to cover the spout threads with redgaurd it is a real hastle to get off. No leaks, looks sleak, but I used a different shower head cause the included one is toooooooooo efficient on water.
customer_reviews.author: ONNAGA

customer_reviews.title: Basic Valve, No volume control.
customer_reviews.text: This is good except there is no volume control. Water only comes out at one pressure. Water also seems to dribble out of the head in tub mode. I don't see why it would, but it's not a big issue. The head also sucks. I bought a different one here on Amazon. Other than that it is working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I actually used a different (bigger/with handheld attachment ) shower head, but love the feel of the temperature control lever and the spigot is fine with pull down diverter.
customer_reviews.author: martha n.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I installed this into our kid's bathroom. Works great. the only thing that I did not realize was the valve's model. Although I had the model number correct, I did not have the year number correct. Delta uses the same model number valves for the old and style valves. The valve for my house was an old-style, so I had to buy the correct valve separately.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Easley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shower hardware sets. I've used them several times on renovations. They look good, are easy to install and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: As described. I had one like this for 10 years no problems
customer_reviews.author: Witold Ziobro

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this faucet and my contractor installed it in our new bathroom. It has broken 5x in less than 6 months. I do not recommend at all...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: great buy for the money! it comes with every thing needed. Go buy you some shark bite fittings and the job will be easy peezee.
customer_reviews.author: John Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the delta water fitting behind the wall, or an equivalent faucet that accepts the same cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kaner

customer_reviews.title: Set Screw install impossible
customer_reviews.text: It said that a set screw install was possible for the tub spout. It came with a hex key and a set screw. The only problem is the brass adapter has NO HOLE FOR THE SCREW!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It looks good
customer_reviews.text: It only took a couple four letter works to get it installed, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: ARB

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough for Kids' Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 2 years ago for the kids' shower. The youngest is 3 and needed something that is easy to use, yet stylish and durable. This fit the bill. I trust the Delta brand as I have 2 other shower sets from them. This last purchase is to outfit an external shower
customer_reviews.author: Afiva

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Havent installed it yet but seems durable and of good quality. Pleased
customer_reviews.author: venaL

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet set.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set, loved the shower head too. My contractor installed this and had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: j21blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am totally disappointed and dissatisfied about this item. I bought 2 of the items and they cannot install, there are no body with the items to connect to the wall..i just cannot use them and my money gone down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for approx 2 weeks. Looks very nice in our updated bathroom. Works as expected. This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spell Family

customer_reviews.title: I think the return time should of been a little longer.
customer_reviews.text: Went by the replacement for the one i had.Although when i went to install it was the wrong one.So im out of a shower set and money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Douangmala

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy with missing valve
customer_reviews.text: This faucet does not have the valve which. Connects to plumbing. I have to go buy the valve and total cost went went higher
customer_reviews.author: Shaheen Pervaiz

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: I install this fixture in my children's bathroom and it is holding up very well, I would definitely recommend this delta faucet
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: great product and great price for a made in USA ...
customer_reviews.text: great product and great price for a made in USA item, look forward to do business with seller in future
customer_reviews.author: Serj K.

customer_reviews.title: The pull-down takes time to get used to
customer_reviews.text: I like not having the pull-up on the spout for easy cleaning and the cleaner look. It does, however, take a little time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Nice Faucet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installation of the rough-in model R10000-UNBX was a bit of a head scratching event as it was the first time I soldered copper pipes. After cutting out the old valve it was not clear if the pipes would fit into the R1000 but it worked like a charm. Having the R1000 rough-in separate from the shower trim made soldering much easier as I did not have to worry about heating up the valve. Installing the trim was a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Tub faucet is plastic
customer_reviews.text: The handle and face plate are metal as described, but I was disappointed to find that the tub faucet is plastic. I will be returning this for a trim set with a metal faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Tn Mom

customer_reviews.title: great product perfect price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, a shower/bath faucet! Shipped quickly and just as the plumber prescribed. Very happy with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Severtson
